channel.title: How do i add commands?

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:9, topic:400549”]1. He never said he was working on a 562?
2. It was like that on servers I’ve downloaded. It could be different now tho, I’m talking about servers people made 2-3 years ago.[/quote]

im using a 3yr old source that i found on my computer and it definetly isnt.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“l0lc0pt3r, post:7, topic:400549”]if hes new to coding, and doesnt even know how to add a command, he shuld be starting on a 317 not 562 :3

#someone2 there has never been a server that i have ever heard of that has that in client.java -.- unless its a client sided command like noclip fpson etc. but if youre putting regular commands in there, u need to quit life -.-[/quote]

  1. He never said he was working on a 562?
  2. It was like that on servers I’ve downloaded. It could be different now tho, I’m talking about servers people made 2-3 years ago.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("cash") && c.playerRights >= PLAYER RIGHT HERE) { c.getItems().addItem(0995,214748364); c.sendMessage("w00t you just got some cash!!"); }

I fixed the code for you in a Project Insanity version above, I believe you had a Delta code. If you have a Delta the code above

won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“Nasz, post:5, topic:400549”][quote author=l0lc0pt3r link=topic=497618.msg3639048#msg3639048 date=1308826877]
first…dont ever put “::” in ur commands… and second it all depends on what source your using.
[/quote]

If it’s 562+, that’s how they are.

Look for other commands in client.java, paste it above/under the command.

L0l’d irl.[/quote]
Whats wrong with it? If it’s 317 it’s in client.java ofcourse. Well, it was like that in all servers I downloaded. Oh wait ofcourse. I don’t download delta or pi to leech so I don’t know about those things.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @pwn_by_maxz pwn by maxz
item.description:
@pwn_by_maxz wrote:

hello, i want to have a command like this:

::cash
and when you do so you will have max cash.

i think i have the right code here:

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::cash")&& playerRights >= 3){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::cash")){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(0995,214748364);
sendMessage(“w00t you just got some cash!!”);

}[/code]

but where the fuck should i place it ?

sry, im new to coding…

would be very happy if some 1 told me how =)
thanks!
//pwn by maxz

Read full topic
